email_subject: RE: Presentation to Trading Track A&A
email_body: Ina, Can you please forward the presentation to Mog. Phillip ---------------------- Forwarded by Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT on 04/18/2001 02:50 PM --------------------------- From: Karen Buckley/ENRON@enronXgate on 04/18/2001 10:56 AM CDT To: Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: RE: Presentation to Trading Track A&A Hi Philip If you do have slides preapred,, can you have your assistant e:mail a copy to Mog Heu, who will conference in from New York. Thanks, karen -----Original Message----- From: Allen, Phillip Sent: Wednesday, April 18, 2001 10:30 AM To: Buckley, Karen Subject: Re: Presentation to Trading Track A&A The topic will the the western natural gas market. I may have overhead slides. I will bring handouts.
